__e: If I decide to stay, it's because it's what I want, not what you want.
There are many things in Heaven and Earth... but you can only have... what I choose to give you.
You know, what would happen if I decided to... Do things different than I've always done, because what I've always done... Doesn't seem to work.
I told you I decided what I want to do with my life.
You might have a part of my brain but the rest of it is me and I decide what goes in it...
But I'm your mother, and from now on, I'll decide what's best for you.
This is my home, Colonel Owen Thursday. And in my home I will say who is to get out and who is to stay.
I DECIDE WHO GETS TO GO AFTER I DECIDE WHICH ONE OF YOU SUCKS THE MOST.
Michael always told me I could come to you. Yeah. These people killed my fiancé, the father of my child.
Why don't you tell me what my dad said... and I'll decide what it's worth.
You might have a part of my brain but the rest of it is me and I decide what goes in it...
In my classroom, I get to determine what's fair and what isn't fair.
Look, I decide what happens with my son... me.
Mary, there's nothing wrong with making some money while I figure out what to do with the rest of my life.
I might decide it's fine by me, but I want to know, damn it !
I'm the king here, and what I say doesn't live dies.
And right now, I'm deciding that me and my son are leaving!
